system.descriptionText:
1. Knowledge is Life, Life is Knowledge (300xp): Gain any two Trained Scholastic Lore Skills. Gain Total Recall Talent. Can buy Additional Trained Scholastic Lore Skill for 200xp.
2. Know thy Foe (200xp): Gain any one Trained Forbidden Lore Skill. Can buy a second for an additional 200xp.
3. Knowledge is Power, Guard it Well (300xp): +3 Intelligence or +3 Perception. Gain any one Trained Common or Scholastic Lore Skill. Gain Foresight Talent.
